title: Undrafted Gems + TNF Preview, Week 1 Hype! - Fantasy Football Podcast for 9/8
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode just ahead of Week 1 kickoff. On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason bring up players on the waiver wire to keep an eye on! You won't be surprised when they are Week 2 waiver pickups! Plus, the latest NFL News and a Week 1 edition of Buy or Sell. Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast -- Fantasy Football Podcast for September 8th, 2021 
 (04:40) - Buy or Sell
 (09:25) - NFL News
 (20:00) - Undrafted Gems
 (21:30) - Donald Parham Jr. / Josh Palmer
 (25:00) - Ty Johnson
 (30:00) - Ben Roethlisberger
 (32:40) - Juwan Johnson
 (35:45) - Ty’Son Williams
 (36:20) - Browns DST
 (38:05) - Thursday Night Preview: Cowboys vs Buccaneers
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
